name: Case Technology Ventures
overview: ase Technology Ventures (CTV) is the pre-seed venture capital and technology validation fund at Case Western Reserve University. CTV focuses on creating new companies for the Northeast Ohio region by providing capital to pre-seed stage companies based on intellectual property developed at Case and its affiliate institutions. The fund was launched in November 2002 and invests across technological boundaries. Financial support for CTV comes from Case Western Reserve University and the State of Ohio’s Third Frontier Project.

funding_round.source_description: JumpStart and Case Technology Ventures Invest in Neuros Medical
